summary: 查询PolarDB集群下所有的脱敏规则或目标脱敏规则的详情。

schema.description:
集群ID。
> 您可以通过[DescribeDBClusters](~~98094~~)接口查看账号下所有集群的详细信息，包括集群ID。

Message.description:
请求返回消息。
>请求成功时该参数返回Successful，请求失败时会返回请求异常信息（如错误码等）。

Success.description:
请求结果。取值：

- **true**：请求成功。

- **false**：请求失败。

items.description:
脱敏规则详细配置。
> 关于各参数的详细介绍，详情请参见[ModifyMaskingRules](~~212574~~)中`RuleConfig`的参数描述。
items.example: "{\"testrule\":{\"auto\":{\"databases\":[],\"tables\":[\"t1\"],\"columns\":[\"c1\"]},\"applies_to\":[],\"description\":\"This rule will be applied to the columns c1 in table t1\",\"enabled\":\"true\"}}"

RuleVersion.description: 脱敏规则版本, 取值v1、v2, 默认值 v1

404.errorMessage: The DBClusterId provided does not exist in our records.
The specified parameter DBClusterId is not valid.

responseDemo:
[{"type":"json","example":"{
  "RequestId": "2F83D131-1C18-4599-889D-729A9D******",
  "Message": "Successful",
  "Success": true,
  "Data": {
    "RuleList": [
      "\"{\\\"testrule\\\":{\\\"auto\\\":{\\\"databases\\\":[],\\\"tables\\\":[\\\"t1\\\"],\\\"columns\\\":[\\\"c1\\\"]},\\\"applies_to\\\":[],\\\"description\\\":\\\"This rule will be applied to the columns c1 in table t1\\\",\\\"enabled\\\":\\\"true\\\"}}\""
    ],
    "RuleVersion": "v1"
  },
  "DBClusterId": "pc-bp1s826a1up******"
}","errorExample":""},{"type":"xml","example":"<DescribeMaskingRulesResponse>
    <RequestId>2F83D131-1C18-4599-889D-729A9D******</RequestId>
    <Message>Successful</Message>
    <Success>true</Success>
    <Data>
        <RuleList>"{\"testrule\":{\"auto\":{\"databases\":[],\"tables\":[\"t1\"],\"columns\":[\"c1\"]},\"applies_to\":[],\"description\":\"This rule will be applied to the columns c1 in table t1\",\"enabled\":\"true\"}}"</RuleList>
    </Data>
    <DBClusterId>pc-bp1s826a1up******</DBClusterId>
</DescribeMaskingRulesResponse>","errorExample":""}]
title: 查询脱敏规则列表
